name: Warlock of the Fiend
damage_resistances: slashing damage from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
languages: any two languages (usually Abyssal or Infernal)

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
descriptions: The warlock's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save DC 15), requiring no material components:

descriptions.raw: At will: alter self, false life, levitate (self only), mage armor (self only), silent image
descriptions.hyperlinked: At will: alter self, false life, levitate (self only), mage armor (self only), silent image

descriptions.raw: 1/day each: feeblemind, finger of death, plane shift
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1/day each: feeblemind, finger of death, plane shift

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The warlock is a l7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): eldritch blast, fire bolt, friends, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, shocking grasp
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): eldritch blast, fire bolt, friends, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, shocking grasp

descriptions.raw: 1st-5th level (4 5th-level slots): banishment, burning hands, flame strike, hellish rebuke, magic circle, scorching ray, scrying, stinking cloud, suggestion, wall of fire
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st-5th level (4 5th-level slots): banishment, burning hands, flame strike, hellish rebuke, magic circle, scorching ray, scrying, stinking cloud, suggestion, wall of fire

special_abilities.name: Dark One's Own Luck (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
descriptions: When the warlock makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a d10 to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll's effects occur.

actions.name: Mace.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage.
